attributes.additional_details: So many people have been so badly affected by the organisation of the Games that there will be MILLIONS who would wish to see the Games in London cancelled.  It is my bet that David Cameron doesn't have the balls to put this petition up to see just how many people agree with me.  (We know he has a penchant for not wanting to know how the people feel, ergo his disingenuity over his promise to hold an EU referendum, cancelled once he got his posh arse into his seat in Number 10!
